definition: Ma Nancun (1912-1966), pen name of Deng Tuo 鄧拓|邓拓

sentences.english: Our School stands on the ground of the Cheung Ching Estate among greeny hills and waters.
sentences.chinese: 我們的學校，迄立在青山綠水的長青邨。

sentences.english: All activities will take place at the Shun Lee Tsuen unless otherwise specified.
sentences.chinese: 除以上有註明的活動地點外，所有活動於順利邨舉行。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Tin Heng Estate via the Footbridge to Grandeur Terrace and the Public Right of Way.
sentences.chinese: 可由天恆邨經連接俊宏軒的行人天橋及公共通道前往。

definition: tenement building, typically of 2-4 stories, with a shop on the ground floor and upper floors used for residential purposes (esp. in southern China)
North Point district of Hong Kong
Sham Shui Po district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
food stall/open-air restaurant (originally Hong Kong usage, now usually written as 大排檔|大排档[da4 pai2 dang4]
